Translations.Text: Vony prahnutʹ zahasyty svitlo Allaha svoyimy vustamy, ta Allah bazhaye dovershyty svitlo Svoye, khoch by tse y bulo nenavysne dlya neviruyuchykh
Vin — Toy, Khto poslav Svoho Poslantsya z pryamym shlyakhom i relihiyeyu istyny, shchob perevershyty neyu vsi inshi relihiyi, khoch by tse y bulo nenavysne dlya bahatobozhnykiv

O vy, yaki uviruvaly! Voistynu, bahato khto z uchenykh i chentsiv nepravedno pozhyraye mayno lyudey i zbyvaye yikh zi shlyakhu Allaha. A shchodo tykh, yaki nakopychuyutʹ zoloto y sriblo ta ne zhertvuyutʹ yoho na shlyakhu Allaha, to spovisty yim dobru zvistku pro bolisnu karu
Toho Dnya yoho roztoplyatʹ u vohni pekla y zatavruyutʹ nym yikhni chola, boky ta spyny: «Osʹ te, shcho vy nakopychuvaly dlya sebe. Tozh skushtuyte toho, shcho vy nakopychuvaly

Voistynu, chyslo misyatsiv u Allaha — dvanadtsyatʹ, yak bulo zapysano v Pysanni v denʹ, koly Vin stvoryv nebesa y zemlyu. Chotyry z nykh — zaboroneni. Tse — istynna relihiya, tozh ne budʹte v tsey chas nespravedlyvi sami do sebe. Boritʹsya z bahatobozhnykamy vsi razom — tak samo, yak razom vedutʹ borotʹbu z vamy vony. I znayte, shcho Allah — iz bohoboyazlyvymy
